com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices

Interface WZAudioDevice.AudioSampleListener

  • Enclosing class:
    WZAudioDevice

    public static interface WZAudioDevice.AudioSampleListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isWZAudioSampleListenerEnabled()
      Indicates if audio samples should be sent to the onWZAudioSampleRecorded method or not
      void onWZAudioPaused(boolean paused)
      This method is called is the audio stream is paused or unpaused during a broadcast
      void onWZAudioSampleListenerRelease()
      This method is called when the audio stream broadcast has been stopped
      void onWZAudioSampleListenerSetup(WZMediaConfig audioConfig)
      This method will be called just before streaming begins
      void onWZAudioSampleRecorded(byte[] sampleData, int sampleDataLength, long timecodeNanos)
      This method is called with a buffer containing the audio sample data

    • Method Detail

      • isWZAudioSampleListenerEnabled

        boolean isWZAudioSampleListenerEnabled()
        Indicates if audio samples should be sent to the onWZAudioSampleRecorded method or not
        Returns:
        true if onWZAudioSampleRecorded should be called with new audio sample data, false otherwise

      • onWZAudioSampleListenerSetup

        void onWZAudioSampleListenerSetup(WZMediaConfig audioConfig)
        This method will be called just before streaming begins
        Parameters:
        audioConfig - The broadcast stream configuration

      • onWZAudioSampleRecorded

        void onWZAudioSampleRecorded(byte[] sampleData,
                             int sampleDataLength,
                             long timecodeNanos)
        This method is called with a buffer containing the audio sample data
        Parameters:
        sampleData - The raw audio sample data
        sampleDataLength - The length of the data in bytes
        timecodeNanos - The timecode of the sample in nanoseconds

      • onWZAudioPaused

        void onWZAudioPaused(boolean paused)
        This method is called is the audio stream is paused or unpaused during a broadcast
        Parameters:
        paused - A flag indicating whether the audio stream is paused or unpaused

      • onWZAudioSampleListenerRelease

        void onWZAudioSampleListenerRelease()
        This method is called when the audio stream broadcast has been stopped
